MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the  CH46 and CH47 postcode area of Moreton and Meols, affecting properties in Park Lane, Moreton Common, Leasowe Common and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  8:31PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the electrical cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:10PM on 12th April 2021.
